etri.sdn.controller.module.learningmac

Class MacVlanPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.module.learningmac.MacVlanPair

  • public class MacVlanPair
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a modified version of the original MacVlanPair of Floodlight. This class manages association between MAC address, VLAN value, and the switch that reported the MAC and VLAN to the controller.
    Author:
    bjlee
